description:
There are only two days left of summer vacation. As Cinephoto Club reflects upon this past summer, they realize they haven`t eaten shaved ice yet! To make this the best summer vacation without any regrets, the group takes one last trip to enjoy all the shaved ice spots listed on the Yamanashi Shaved Iced Map.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Enjoying All the Spots on the Yamanashi Shaved Ice Map
山梨かき氷マップ完全制覇
